name: PAINT (Morana)
description:
PAINT is a top-down shooter made during the Falunacy 2017 Game Jam, by a team of seven PlaygroundSquad students.

In PAINT, you must collect the 12 keys spread throughout the map and escape the vicious Crawlings. If they get to you, it's an instant game over.

The Crawlings are hard to defeat, but will perish if you manage to cover their entire body in paint.

-- CONTROLS --

Movement: WASD

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Knockback: Right Mouse Button

-- KNOWN ISSUES --

  • The performance is bad, sorry!
  • You need to Alt+F4 to exit the game.
